    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        The method drawing the board with alive cells, background. and grid. The method will draw the board according to the array applied in the Rules class.

      • userDrawCell

        public void userDrawCell()
        The method which lets the user set or remove cells manually from the board.

      • setDrawScale

        public void setDrawScale(double value)
        The method scaling the board. The higher the value passed in the larger the board will become.
        Parameters:
        value - the value used to change the size of the board.

        public void start()
        The method starting the animation of the board
